item.title: Hello-IT Setup and Deployment
item.description: I have recently been playing with a tool called Hello IT. It has been a wonderful tool in testing and I am getting excited to send it out here in our district. I believe it will help our staff be able to communicate to us effectively. Our current layout looks like this:
